b13cb91f-aece-4e5c-bf62-3bf50069a44f.description: Earners of the Equity Essentials for Philanthropy Tech badge have participated in a multi-modal and outcomes-oriented curriculum designed to enhance their knowledge and skills in advancing racial equity through philanthropy tech. They are prepared to operationalize equity using a greater awareness of structural racism and the frameworks and tools necessary for dismantling it.
b13cb91f-aece-4e5c-bf62-3bf50069a44f.name: Equity Essentials for Philanthropy Tech

issuer.summary: issued by Technology Association of Grantmakers

badge_template_activities.title: Complete self-guided online coursework: Shared Language to Advance Equity, Structural Racism in the US, Frameworks & Tools to Advance Racial Equity-Inclusive & Participatory Application Design, Exploring the Role of Data in Equity Work, Operationalizing Equity

Participate in 5 monthly peer learning events to provide context on the course's learning objectives and support badge earners in building rapport with peers on the journey. The time commitment for each event ranges from 60-90 minutes.
